bibl.title: with the assistance of Maria ARAPOPOULOU and Maria CHRITI, A History of Ancient Greek. From the Beginnings to Late Antiquity
bibl.note: Introduction. - Classical and Hellenistic katadesmoi. - Greek magical papyri and katadesmoi under the Roman empire. - Selected texts.
CURBERA J.B. and D.R. JORDAN, The Language of Greek katadesmoi and Magical Papyri.
A.-F. CHRISTIDIS (Ed.), with the assistance of Maria ARAPOPOULOU and Maria CHRITI, A History of Ancient Greek. From the Beginnings to Late Antiquity (Cambridge, 2007) pp. 1347-1354, figg. 104-106.
